title: I got a perma ban

replies.body: It looks like there was some kind of suspicious activity going on that might have meant someone had hacked your account. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help out and go over everything about your account.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uN6oty6e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-23T02:35:05.549+0000)
>
> It looks like there was some kind of suspicious activity going on that might have meant someone had hacked your account. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help out and go over everything about your account.

I had a similar issue and filed a ticket about it, but the Rioters working on it don't seem to understand that issue.
